description:
This course will show you how to take amazing photographs of children. You will learn the technical, psychological and business aspects of children's photography. There are 26 video lessons totaling over 4.5 hours of instruction. The course will take you through different steps of taking pictures of individual cooperative children to groups with some high energy as well as extremely shy children. No stage models here. Real children in real photographic situations. There is a 1 hour bonus lesson on the business aspect of children's photography. Take this course and gain the skills and confidence you need to take amazing pictures of children.

Photographing kids can be a challenge. Children have different personalities. By understanding the psychology of how to get the reaction you want, Manny Pontoriero's "Photographing Children" will show you what you need to get great shots and great expressions.
title: Photographing Children
